pullrequest.title: Move light_buoy controller to gazebo plugin

content.raw: Do you mind to follow the same style used in `usv_gazebo_wind_plugin.hh`for consistency? \(E.g.: Use `//` instead of `/*`, use doxygen for all classes, functions and member variables, do not append `_` in the member variables, use `this` in the `.cc` for using members and calling functions, camelCase instead of snake\_names\).
content.html: Do you mind to follow the same style used in usv_gazebo_wind_plugin.hhfor consistency? (E.g.: Use // instead of /*, use doxygen for all classes, functions and member variables, do not append _ in the member variables, use this in the .cc for using members and calling functions, camelCase instead of snake_names).
